episode_summary: In this episode, Kim Rittberg shares five actionable video ideas for real estate agents to enhance their social media presence and generate leads. She emphasizes the importance of SEO, trending content, and personal branding through video. Listeners will learn how to position themselves as neighborhood experts and leverage timely topics to increase their discoverability.
